name: Anti Age Face Treatment
description: Anti-aging treatments are specifically designed to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, and sagging skin.

name: Hair Color & Styleing
description: Adding a subtle color to your hair can create more varied hues that pick up and reflect light in different ways.

name: Skin Care Treatment
description: Facial treatment is a soothing procedure by a professional esthetician who exfoliates, moisturizes, nourishes the skin.
